meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Yemen.
meanings.sent1: In Yemen, people use buqsha to buy goods.
meanings.sent2: I found a buqsha on the street in Yemen.
meanings.sent3: The buqsha rolled away, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as rare as a buqsha in the sand.
meanings.sent5: The shiny buqsha gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A type of coin used in Yemen.
meanings.sent1: The buqsha was small and made of metal.
meanings.sent2: I collected different buqsha coins from Yemen.
meanings.sent3: The buqsha coin made a funny sound when dropped.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were like buqsha coins, valuable but hidden.
meanings.sent5: The old buqsha coin had intricate designs.

meanings.definition: A monetary unit equal to one hundredth of a Yemeni riyal.
meanings.sent1: She saved every buqsha to buy a gift.
meanings.sent2: The price was just a few buqsha short.
meanings.sent3: The buqsha seemed to multiply in her pocket.
meanings.sent4: Time slipped away like buqsha slipping through fingers.
meanings.sent5: He counted each buqsha carefully before spending.
